name: ID
definition: the ID allocated to the specific fund

name: NAME
definition: the long name used to identify the fund

name: LBU
definition: the long name used to identify the BU associated with the fund

name: SHORT_NAME
definition: the short name used to idenfity the fund

name: DISPLAY_POSITION
definition: the order to which the fund is displayed in, applies to HK output file only, new funds should be using a higher number than the current max

name: TYPE
definition: the type of the fund, 'Par' / 'Non Par' / 'SHF' / 'N/A'

name: SUB_LBU
definition: the name of the entity the fund is in, used for ad-hoc reports in Hong Kong only

name: SAA_GROUP
definition: the saa group of the fund, used in TAA template for Hong Kong only

name: VFA
definition: whether the fund is using a variable fee approach (typically par = VFA and non-par = non-VFA, UL breaks the role and is non-par but VFA)
